flawed_nl_solution:
Denise is 25 - 2 = <<25-2=21>>21 years old now.
So, Diane is 21 - 4 = <<21-4=17>>17 years old now.
Diane will be 25 years old in 25 - 17 = <<25-17=8>>8 years.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 23, not 21. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
